name: Pydantic Logfire
description: Pydantic Logfire is a new type of observability platform built on the same belief as our open source library â€” that the most powerful tools can be easy to use. The Pydantic library is the most widely used data validation library for Python, downloaded millions of times a day by thousands of developers all over the world. The Pydantic team also maintain a number of major open source projects including: PyO3, starlette, uvicorn, fastui, arq, and jiter.
shortDescription: For too long the open source ecosystem has been taken for granted. We're proud to be part of the movement to change that.
